text: nimaginnu avaribbara (dampatiyara) naduve bikkattina bhayaviddare atana kutumbadinda obba madhyasthanannu hagu akeya kutumbadindalu obba madhyasthanannu nemisiri. Avaribbaru sudharaneyannu bayasiddare, allahanu avara naduve samarasyavannu belesuvanu. Allahanantu sarvajnanu ella visayagala kuritu jagrtanu agiruvanu
